import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {UserService} from "../../service/user.service"; import {User} from "../../model/user"; import {retry} from "rxjs"; @Component({ selector: 'app-users-details', templateUrl: './user-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-details.component.css'] }) export class UserDetailsComponent implements OnInit { user: User | undefined; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private userService: UserService, private location: Location ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getUser(); } getUser(): void { const id: number = parseInt(this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('id')!); this.userService.getUserById(id) .subscribe(user => this.user = user); } }
